title: Foundations of Machine Learning
description: Master core machine learning concepts including regression, classification, and clustering algorithms. Build practical projects using Scikit-learn and understand model evaluation techniques.

title: Deep Learning with TensorFlow
description: Dive into neural networks, convolutional networks, and recurrent networks using TensorFlow. Learn to build and train complex models for various AI applications.

title: Natural Language Processing Fundamentals
description: Explore text processing, sentiment analysis, and language modeling techniques. Work with modern NLP libraries like SpaCy and NLTK to build intelligent text applications.

title: Advanced Data Visualization with Python
description: Create compelling visualizations using Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly. Learn to tell data stories effectively through interactive dashboards and professional charts.

title: Computer Vision with OpenCV
description: Master image processing, object detection, and facial recognition using OpenCV. Build real-world computer vision applications from scratch.

title: AI Strategy for Business Leaders
description: Learn how to implement AI solutions in business environments, measure ROI, and develop AI-driven strategies. No technical background required.

title: Data Engineering with Apache Spark
description: Design and build scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark and cloud technologies. Learn data processing, ETL workflows, and big data architecture patterns.
